author: AP
title: First MLS player tests positive for coronavirus
description: A player for the Philadelphia Union has tested positive for coronavirus, marking MLS' first case of the virus.
content:
A player for the Philadelphia Union has tested positive for coronavirus. It is Major League Soccers first player case of the virus that has caused the suspension of the season.
The Union did not identify the player. He reported mild symptoms.
MLS suspended … [+334 chars]
